Posted By: Londonbrig0 (3/2/2011 5:26:26 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
In a deck based around artifact sac, this isn't just getting rid of your opponent's [Darksteel Axe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Axe) while swingin' for 6. This is getting rid of your opponent's Darksteel crap, attacking with 6 power, getting 3 1/1 tokens and dealing 2-4 damage to any target. Dude's a monster as long as he's got somethin' to grab. If not, he's just a mediocre 4/4 6 drop. Kind of a gamble when it comes down to it.
  
   
On a side note, I always look at this guy as buddies with [Barrage Ogre](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Barrage Ogre). He grabs something, toys around with it for a bit, then hands it to his pal who immediately smashes it into some poor schmuck's face. Priceless.
posts.html:
In a deck based around artifact sac, this isn't just getting rid of your opponent's Darksteel Axe while swingin' for 6. This is getting rid of your opponent's Darksteel crap, attacking with 6 power, getting 3 1/1 tokens and dealing 2-4 damage to any target. Dude's a monster as long as he's got somethin' to grab. If not, he's just a mediocre 4/4 6 drop. Kind of a gamble when it comes down to it.

On a side note, I always look at this guy as buddies with Barrage Ogre. He grabs something, toys around with it for a bit, then hands it to his pal who immediately smashes it into some poor schmuck's face. Priceless.

posts.post_content:

Posted By: MechaKraken (8/4/2011 1:17:50 PM)

posts.post_content:
A situation that would never happen, but would be hilarious if it ever did: three Geargrabbers attacking and stealing [Helm of Kaldra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helm of Kaldra), [Shield of Kaldra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shield of Kaldra) and [Sword of Kaldra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Kaldra), allowing you to produce a Kaldra token, either gibbing the opponent's Kaldra or, if the opponent doesn't have a Kaldra...  
  
-I, the mighty Kaldra, have been summoned! I shall now wield the awesome power of my weapons against your enemies!  
-Uh, sorry, we're gonna have to give that back, see, those artifacts are not actually ours, we just borrowed them.  
-...
posts.html:

-I, the mighty Kaldra, have been summoned! I shall now wield the awesome power of my weapons against your enemies!
-Uh, sorry, we're gonna have to give that back, see, those artifacts are not actually ours, we just borrowed them.
